result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: Agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: Agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: Two minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ga: Dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála
result.orig: Dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála
result.html: Dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an Lárionad TrádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ponchtml: Ḋá nóiméad tar éis a naoi ṗléasc dara foirgneaṁ an Lárionad TrádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.

result.eng: The two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.
result.ga: Bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála trí thine
result.orig: Bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála trí thine
result.html: Bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála trí thineThe two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ḋá ḟoirgneaṁ an Lárionad Trádála trí ṫineThe two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.

result.eng: Both countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ga: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.orig: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.html: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ponchtml: Tá trúpaí Ṁeiriceá sa dá ṫír sin fós deiċ mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: It was the night between the two Days of Christmas.
result.ga: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a bhí ann
result.orig: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a bhí ann
result.html: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a bhí annIt was the night between the two Days of Christmas.
result.ponchtml: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a ḃí annIt was the night between the two Days of Christmas.

result.eng: Long as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ga: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.orig: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.html: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ponchtml: Is gairid mo ẛaol feasta dá ḟadaċt éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.html: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ḟearg ar ẛiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.

result.eng: We are distant relatives.
result.ga: Tá fréamh ghaoil againn dá chéile
result.orig: Tá fréamh ghaoil againn dá chéile
result.html: Tá fréamh ghaoil againn dá chéileWe are distant relatives.
result.ponchtml: Tá fréaṁ ġaoil againn dá ċéileWe are distant relatives.

result.eng: How closely related are we?
result.ga: Cá deas dá chéile sinn
result.orig: Cá deas dá chéile sinn
result.html: Cá deas dá chéile sinnHow closely related are we?
result.ponchtml: Cá deas dá ċéile sinnHow closely related are we?

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: On both sides of the river.
result.ga: Ar dhá thaobh na habhann
result.orig: Ar dhá thaobh na habhann
result.html: Ar dhá thaobh na habhannOn both sides of the river.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḋá ṫaoḃ na haḃannOn both sides of the river.

result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: He was rubbing his eyes.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúil
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúil
result.html: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúilHe was rubbing his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cuimilt a ḋá ẛúilHe was rubbing his eyes.

result.eng: I signed a two-year contract.
result.ga: Shínigh mé conradh dhá bhliain
result.orig: Shínigh mé conradh dhá bhliain
result.html: Shínigh mé conradh dhá bhliainI signed a two-year contract.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíniġ mé conraḋ ḋá ḃliainI signed a two-year contract.

result.eng: I drank two pints.

result.orig: D'ól mé dhá phionta
result.html: D'ól mé dhá phiontaI drank two pints.
result.ponchtml: D'ól mé ḋá ṗiontaI drank two pints.

result.eng: It is two miles away from the house.

result.html: Tá sé dhá mhíle ón teachIt is two miles away from the house.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ḋá ṁíle ón teaċIt is two miles away from the house.

result.eng: Twice as much money.

result.orig: Dhá oiread an airgid

result.ponchtml: Is teaċ ḋá urlár é seoThis is a two-storey house.

result.eng: We only have two options.

result.ponchtml: Níl aċ ḋá roġa againnWe only have two options.

result.eng: He is only two years old.

result.html: Níl sé ach dhá bhliain d'aoisHe is only two years old.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé aċ ḋá ḃliain d'aoisHe is only two years old.

result.eng: You divide the load between two lorries.

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ga: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid GearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis go raiḃ sé ina ċónaí sa Ġearmáin le ḋá ḃliain níor ṫáinig feaḃas ar biṫ ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.

result.eng: I got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.

result.eng: Pól is six years old and Nuala has two years.

result.orig: Tá Pól sé bliana d'aois agus tá dhá bhliain ag Nuala

result.eng: I've got two tickets.
result.ga: Tá dhá thicéad agam
result.orig: Tá dhá thicéad agam
